victim.name: Richard Blackwood
victim.location: Meridian Accounting Firm - Conference Room B

client.name: Miranda Chen
why_appears_guilty: Found alone with victim immediately after death
Had heated argument with victim day before
Her coffee cup contained traces of same poison
Previous disciplinary action from victim for falsifying records
Victim was investigating her recent work
why_actually_innocent: Poison was added to coffee machine, not individual cups
She was being framed by someone with access to her workspace
Victim was actually helping her expose larger fraud scheme
Real killer needed victim silenced before audit completion

real_killer.name: Leonard Morse
real_killer.true_motive: Blackwood discovered Leonard's systematic embezzlement through fake vendor invoices over 5 years, totaling $2.3 million
why_not_suspected: Was in client meeting during estimated time of death
Appeared to be victim's mentor and supporter
Had no obvious motive - financially successful

victory_conditions.expose_fake_invoices: Present evidence of Leonard's phantom vendor scheme
victory_conditions.prove_alibi_false: Demonstrate Leonard's client meeting was fabricated
victory_conditions.show_access_to_poison: Prove Leonard had access to both coffee machine and toxin
victory_conditions.reveal_true_motive: Expose that Blackwood was helping Miranda expose Leonard's embezzlement
victory_conditions.demonstrate_frame_job: Show how Leonard planted evidence to frame Miranda
